item.description:
EVENT: Approximately 6 mile walk from Red Rock Bistro  in Swampscott to the Tides Restaurant in Nahant and back.  We will walk through 3 towns of Swampscott ( an Olmstead planned community) Lynn and Nahant. Great views and great company.  In previous years we have seen people flying kitess and building sand castles. We will have lunch on the beach near the Tides restaurant. Option of buying your lunch at the Tides outdoor stand.  Wear or bring your suit if it is warm.  There is a bath house about halfway through the walk. Bring water, hat, and sunscreen.  

Trip's Leader, Naomi and she will be wearing a big blue hat with a silver stripe.
RSVP: Required by 4pm on 7/29
MEET: 11:00 am in front of Red Rock Bistro at 141 Humphrey Street in Swampscott.  Take the 10:15 am, 442 bus from Wonderland. Get off across from 174 Humphrey St. Public transportation. Swampscott train station is half mile away. Contact leader with any questions.
COST: No charge for event. $5 if you are not full paid member of Mosaic.
item.how_to_find_us: contact Naomi for the details but plan to meet in front of the Red Rock Bistro

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Fifth Annual Nahant Beach Walk
